RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAY MAYHEM stalked the pace three wide into the stretch, surged three wide to make the lead in deep stretch and drew clear under a strong hand ride. FACT NOT FICTION bore in at the start, battled for the lead along the inside through the turn, gained a clear advantage then was no match for the winner. AFTER SUNRISE had good early speed three wide, shifted inside entering the stretch then finished evenly. TADZIO veered in at the start, contested the lead two wide through the turn then was used up.

ENTRY.NAME: Fact Not Fiction
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in start, dueled inside, led, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Tadzio
ENTRY.OWNER: Spicer, Richard and Spitler, D. William
ENTRY.COMMENT: veered in start, dueled 2 wide, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: May Mayhem
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, surged late, going away

ENTRY.NAME: After Sunrise
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 3 wide, angled in top lane, even finish

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 78. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 20000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $8,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 27 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 27 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YEARS AGO battled for the lead along the inside, dug in gamely late under left handed urging and proved best. GRAN MAMIBELLA dueled with the winner three then two wide and finished second best. COURTLY raced outside and went evenly. LILAC LACE had sharp early speed between rivals two wide, dropped back before a quarter then finished evenly. BACKSPLASH failed to menace. SPECIAL BEACH was no factor. DIVINE MARTHA reared at the start and was never close. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN BUT TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Years Ago
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, dug in gamely, proved best

ENTRY.NAME: Lilac Lace
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed between horses, dropped back early, even finish

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JANUARY 27. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEBDURITE matched strides for the lead two and three wide then entire trip, was put to right handed urging in upper stretch, made the lead late under left handed urging and proved best in a stiff drive. MR. TRIPLEDOUBLE broke sharply, matched strides for the lead along the inside in the two path but couldn't handle the winner in the final stages. OWN THE TOWN saved ground, offered a mild bid in upper stretch, was in a bit tight past the furlong marker then outfinished. CANDY CRUSHEM stalked the pace three wide and went evenly. OPEN OUT failed to menace. RAMIRIN was no threat. YOUVESAIDITALL was outrun. GEH SCHNELL was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Own the Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, bid upper stretch, bit tight, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Tripledouble
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, matched strides inside, 2path, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Debdurite
ENTRY.COMMENT: matched strides 2 wide, dug in late, long drive, proved best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 54. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 27 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since May 27 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races Fo r $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BRONZE KETTLE bumped at the start, was outrun for six furlongs, swung wide, closed with a rush under right then left handed urging and got up in the final strides while three wide. WATCHOUTFORWEAVER bumped at the start, saved ground, closed fast two wide through deep stretch and got up for second. CHILTEPIN bumped at the start, was allowed to settle, closed rapidly three wide on the far turn turn make the lead nearing the quarter pole, opened a daylight lead before the furlong marker then was outfinished. DANES HEART pressed the pace two wide for sis furlongs then weakened. PLAYING BALL failed to respond. THE GOSPEL OF MARK was outrun. FACTUM'S STAR set a pressured pace along the inside for nearly six furlongs then stopped. SWEET JILL'S JACK was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Factum's Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, inside, stopped lane

ENTRY.NAME: Chiltepin
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, quick move, 3 wide 2nd turn, drew clear,outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Bronze Kettle
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, swung wide, closed with a rush, up in final strides

ENTRY.NAME: Watchoutforweaver
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, saved ground, closed fast, 2 wide, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Danes Heart
ENTRY.OWNER: McFadden Jr Joseph A and Fewster Melody K

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 65. Allowance Purse 38400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 27 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 27 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RUN ROCKY sprinted to the lead shortly after the start, set all the pace, shook clear on the turn and lasted under strong handling. A PRAYER FOR KIDS never far back, rallied through deep stretch four wide and got up for second. TIER ONE chased the winner along the inside and finished with good courage. WETZEL chased the winner three wide and went evenly. UNBRIDLED CAUSE had speed two wide into the turn then weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Run Rocky
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace, shook clear, lasted

ENTRY.NAME: Wetzel
ENTRY.OWNER: Pickerrell William D Pickerrell Joe and Cline Robert C

ENTRY.NAME: A Prayer for Kids
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late rally, 4 wide, up place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OPTIONAL, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 27 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 27 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HEY EUGENE stalked pace the early pace, rallied four wide through the turn, made the lead nearing the top of the stretch and drew off under right handed urging to win as much the best. KID RUSSELL close up three wide, steadied inside the winner past the five sixteenths pole, angled out and finished second best. WILDCAT EXPRESS trailed into the turn and passed tiring rivals in the five path. FAST CLIP away alertly, set a pressured pace along the inside through the turn and weakened in the stretch. COUNTRY RUCKUS moved up along the inside on the turn then came up empty. FAST AS FAST CAN B was through early. THE RIDER OF KID RUSSELL LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF THE WINNER FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE ON THE TURN. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS UPHELD THE ORIGINAL ORDER OF FINISH.

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Clip
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Kid Russell
ENTRY.COMMENT: close 3w, steadied, angled out late turn,2nd best, claimed foul

ENTRY.NAME: Hey Eugene
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, rallied 4 wide turn, drew off, much the best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 14000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 27 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since May 27 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNCLEJACKOMO unhurried early, closed fast along the rail through the stretch and got up in the final strides. MASTER broke i front, set a pressured pace two wide, edged clear in upper stretch then couldn't handle the late charge of the winner. AWESOME ENOUGH pressed the pace along the rail for a half, altered course to the three path at the top of the stretch and faded late. DOMI passed tiring rivals. EL SICARIO close up, failed to respond. LED TASSO pressed the pace three wide and weakened in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Unclejackomo
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, closed fast rail, up in final strides,

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Enough
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, angled out 3path top lane, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Master
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pressured pace 2 wide, shook clear, caught

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 65. Allowance Purse 38400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 27 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since May 27 Allowed 4 lb s. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LUCKY PENNY ROSE well back early, closed rapidly four wide through the far turn, made the lead nearing the quarter pole then widened at will the balance of the trip to win easily. KERRI'S MIRACLE away alertly, set the pace along the inside for nearly six furlongs then was no match for the winner. STATE OF GRACE passed tiring rivals in the four path. SWEET CHELSEA was no factor. KISS VALENTINA chased the pace into the stretch then faltered in the stretch. CHILLVILLE stalked the early pace, moved closer three wide before a half then came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Kerri's Miracle
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace 1/4 pole, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Penny Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, closed fast, 4 wide, much the best, easily,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Mr. & Mrs. Joseph A McFadden Jr. & Mr.& Mrs. Melody K Fews
